refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The function SSL_CONF_CTX_new() allocates and initialises an SSL_CONF_CTX structure for use with the SSL_CONF functions.
The function SSL_CONF_CTX_free() frees up the context cctx. If cctx is NULL nothing is done.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: SSL_CONF_CTX_new() returns either the newly allocated SSL_CONF_CTX structure or NULL if an error occurs.
SSL_CONF_CTX_free() does not return a value.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: These functions were first added to OpenSSL 1.0.2
